overview:
Laney is co-founder and COO of BigTent, an online home for trusted groups.

Laney’s career has been focused on giving communities online and offline tools to connect and organize. She spent the decade previous to BigTent coaching and training hundreds of community leaders, in the US and Mexico, most recently as the Director of Community Programs for the Coro Center for Civic Leadership. In 2002, Laney co-founded The Princess Project, a non-profit which engages thousands of girls and women across California each year in volunteer opportunities. Laney received the Jefferson Award for Public Service in 2008 and is currently a board member of Zeum: San Franciscoâ€™s Childrenâ€™s Museum and The Princess Project.
